msgs.text:
River - Best way to DCA Bitcoin. Use link https://river.com/signup?r=H4FMHRUS
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Buy things with your Fold card & get #Bitcoin rewards back! Using my link gets u 5k sats (& 20k more after getting the card)! Make sure u sign up for the card! There's a free & premium version. You can also spin a wheel daily to win more sats - It's free and fun! Here's my link:
https://use.foldapp.com/r/NEEDCREATIONS
@fold_app
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here is my referral code for an app that gives you bitcoin rewards for walking! If you use my code, you get 100 free sats. You can also spin a wheel, play chess, answer surveys, and watch videos to earn free bitcoin. The reward rate isn't fabulous (I've almost earned 1000 satoshis after a couple months of use), but it's still fun to earn even a little bitcoin just for your steps! Use this link when signing up for sMiles https://join.smilesbitcoin.com/needcreations355 If you have any questions, please let me know.

Here is my referral code for Lolli app where you can earn more Bitcoin rewards for shopping online. For example, you get 24% on eharmony.com, 6% on Booking.com, 5.5% at Macy's, 4.5% on Expedia and Nike, 3% at Old Navy, 1.5% at Walgreens, 1% at Best Buy and on eBay, and many more. If you have an Apple phone you can open a daily loot box to get free sats as well. https://lolli.com/share/AyYQRrGyyq

Strike is an app you can use to buy and sell Bitcoin with almost zero fees. You can actually *hourly* DCA with Strike which is pretty cool (minimum $0.50/hr). You can also send Bitcoin to external wallets using the Lightning Network. Using my referral https://invite.strike.me/NKP150 gets you $10

Oshi is a new Bitcoin app that can help you find businesses near you that accept Bitcoin as payment. Here is my referral link to join Oshi:
https://oshi.team/NEEDcreations
Satsback is another Bitcoin rewards online shop. Here is my referral link: https://satsback.com/register/mO5gja41o6WkVe8b

Earn 2100 sats by completing this Bitcoin course. It's MUCH easier than it sounds. One brief email per day for 21 days, then a short quiz. After that, 2100 sats are yours! Use my referral link to start: https://sparklp.co/028b2f45
Carrot is an app that gives you sats for reading articles about Bitcoin. I don't think it has a referral link feature.

Amber is another DCA app with cool premium features like "Buy the dip" (auto spot buy when the price of Bitcoin drops a certain percentage) and "Buy the Schiff" (buy Bitcoin whenever Peter Schiff tweets about Bitcoin).
Use my code: "NEEDcreations" and you'll get $10 to kickstart your Bitcoin investment journey with the Amber app. Download the app here: https://amber.app

Cash App - You can spot buy, limit order and DCA Bitcoin with cash app.
Sign up using my code and you'll get $5. DRLRTNC 
https://cash.app/app/DRLRTNC
Then, convert the money to bitcoin!

The Bitcoin Company is a new gift card Bitcoin rewards app. You get 1000 sats right after signing up. Check out my referral code:
Download The Bitcoin Company app to start earning bitcoin back on all your purchases. Use my referral code: JX5H6M
https://links.thebitcoincompany.com/tas6

On this site you can gamble sats along with some other features but I stick to the faucet which can be claimed every hour. You need to earn 30,000 sats before you can withdraw. This can take 6+ months depending how active you are. Here is my referral link:
https://freebitco.in/?r=49323040

Bitrefill is a gift cards app with Bitcoin rewards. Note that you can not withdraw your Bitcoin rewards. You need to spend them on the app. 
Here is my referral link that will get you $5 in sats: https://www.bitrefill.com/signup?code=warrdsdo
Earn sats while listening to podcasts on Fountain:

Noah - New Bitcoin app with multiple ways to earn sats. Still in Beta:
https://app.noah.com/?referralCode=NEEDcreations

Orange pill app - locate bitcoiners in your area for meetups. Find merchants who accept Bitcoin. Find events near you.
https://signup.theorangepillapp.com/opa/NEEDcreations
Earn sats for watching ads and taking surveys https://addslice.com/?crew=HHGv6n1w

Meet other Bitcoiners near you and find local meetups with Orange Pill app. This app is awesome and worth the money IMO. Here's my referral 
https://signup.theorangepillapp.com/opa/NEEDcreations

Bitcoin Well exchange (lightning enabled) US & Canada
https://app.bitcoinwell.com/ref/needcreations

Bitcoin/Crypto taxes - I use CoinLedger. It works well 
https://coinledger.io/?fpr=flj9a

BTC Pins - Bitcoin shop with cool pins, stickers and other apparel
https://btcpins.com/?aff=needcreations%40strike.me

Bitaxe miners from solosatoshi
https://www.solosatoshi.com/aff/1013/

Prediction market for gambling sats Predyx
https://beta.predyx.com/?ref=PREDYX6FXZ7HGZ

Referral code: PREDYX6FXZ7HGZ

Not financial advice. Gamble at your own risk
Google Pixel (from Google Store), nice for install of GrapheneOS for privacy. referral code REF-2TPBZP4Y4J13AC7M114E40F at checkout!

Crypto Cloaks - lots of cool 3D printed Bitcoin stuff! Also sells bitaxes and other home miners
https://www.cryptocloaks.com/aff/need/
ppq.ai - Use literally any AI model - text, image, audio, video, and pay in Bitcoin per query (browser based, no subscription or sign up! https://ppq.ai/invite/facab3d0
Creating your own website and need a reliable and easy way to host it? Check out Hostinger (way cheaper than GoDaddy) https://hostinger.com?REFERRALCODE=A5QINFO607ST
Switch your phone plan to Google Fi and pay only $50 for unlimited data. Referral code P3CEFE gets you $60 credit too
